## Introduction
Celltype assignment.


```{r}
library(Seurat)
library(tidyverse)
library(SingleR)
library(patchwork)
library(circlize)
library(ComplexHeatmap)
library(here)
library(SingleCellExperiment)
source(here("plot_theme.R"))
source(here("helper_functions.R"))
set.seed(123)
```


```{r}
# load integrated ctrl dataset.
ctrl <- readRDS(here("output", "ctrlRNAi_seurat_integrated.rds"))

# currated table of marker genes based on the literature such as https://www.pnas.org/doi/10.1073/pnas.1916820117 or https://www.science.org/doi/10.1126/science.abk2432 or
# https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S2211124715006075
marker_table <- data.frame(
    gene = c(
        "betaTry", "epsilonTry", "alphaTry",
        "nub", "Myo31DF",
        "esg", "N", "E(spl)mbeta-HLH", "klu",
        "Dl",
        "Vha100-4", "Vha16-1", "MtnC", "CG17109",
        "pros", "7B2", "IA-2",
        "PGRP-SC1a", "PGRP-SC1b", "Jon65Ai", "Jon65Aii", "Jon66Ci", "Jon66Cii",
        "lambdaTry", "LManVI", "iotaTry", "etaTry", "zetaTry",
        "thetaTry", "Npc2f",
        "Smvt", "ct"
    ),
    celltype = c(
        "aEC", "aEC", "aEC",
        "dEC", "dEC",
        "EB", "EB", "EB", "EB",
        "ISC",
        "Copper\ncells", "Copper\ncells", "Copper\ncells", "Copper\ncells",
        "EE", "EE", "EE",
        "LFC", "LFC", "LFC", "LFC", "LFC", "LFC", "LFC",
        "pEC", "pEC", "pEC", "pEC",
        "mEC", "mEC",
        "MT", "MT"
    )
)


Idents(ctrl) <- factor(ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3, levels = as.character(0:29))
p <- marker_heatmap(
    seurat = ctrl,
    markers = marker_table$gene,
    celltype = marker_table$celltype,
    group.by = "integrated_snn_res.1.3",
    cap_value = 3
)
p
# based on the heatmap  assign the labels
# really hard to specifically pick out an ISC cluster.
ctrl$celltype_manual <- case_when(
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 0 ~ "EB",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 1 ~ "EB",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 2 ~ "EB",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 3 ~ "EB",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 4 ~ "EB",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 5 ~ "aEC",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 6 ~ "aEC",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 7 ~ "EB",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 8 ~ "EB",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 9 ~ "ISC",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 10 ~ "EB",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 11 ~ "EB",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 12 ~ "EB",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 13 ~ "pEC",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 14 ~ "ISC",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 15 ~ "mEC",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 16 ~ "daEC",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 17 ~ "dEC",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 18 ~ "EB",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 19 ~ "aEC",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 20 ~ "LFC",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 21 ~ "ISC",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 22 ~ "aEC",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 23 ~ "EB",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 24 ~ "Copper",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 25 ~ "EE",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 26 ~ "aEC",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 27 ~ "aEC",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 28 ~ "aEC",
    ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3 == 29 ~ "MT",
    T ~ ctrl$integrated_snn_res.1.3
)


ctrl$celltype_manual <- factor(ctrl$celltype_manual,
    levels = c("ISC", "EB", "dEC", "daEC", "aEC", "Copper", "mEC", "LFC", "pEC", "EE", "MT")
)

marker_table$celltype <- factor(marker_table$celltype,
    levels = c("ISC", "EB", "dEC", "daEC", "aEC", "Copper", "mEC", "LFC", "pEC", "EE", "MT")
)

saveRDS(ctrl, here("output", "ctrlRNAi_seurat_integrated_annotated.rds"))
```
